data.name: Feast Your Eyes: Little Marshmallow - Official Soundtrack & Other Goodies
data.detailed_description:
The official soundtrack for 'Feast Your Eyes: Little Marshmallow'. Once purchased, the soundtrack will be located within the main game's installation folder (that you may easily locate by right clicking the game in your Steam Library, choosing 'Properties', going to the 'Local Files' tab, and then selecting 'Browse Local Files'. It'll be among the game's files, in a folder labelled 'Feast Your Eyes: Little Marshmallow - Official Soundtrack & Other Goodies').

The soundtrack comes in 320kbps .mp3's, all properly labelled, all appropriately marked and labelled for easy organization with album art. There is around 80 minutes worth of music between 68 songs, including extensions of songs found in the main game. There is also a simple .txt additional document (in English) that expands on the background of the game, and a few concept sketches.

Spoilers below;

Tracklist:
01. A Need For Title (0:24)
02. Simon's Works (1:29)
03. A Quiet Descent (0:54)
04. Crystallized Friends (1:42)

11. It's Coming Around The Corner (0:28)

13. Isn't Real But Maybe Once Was (2:12)
14. The Town That's Always Raining (1:20)
15. Town Center and Post Office (0:50)

28. Exurb (2:18)

30. The Meeting (0:59)
31. Construction Site (1:06)
32. Splintering Words (0:37)
33. Cry Baby Blues (2:25)
34. Surreal Sewers (1:02)
35. Terror Keeps On Marching (0:46)
36. Gymnopedie No 1 (1:48)
37. White Space (1:01)

39. Marbles (1:30)
40. Love Letters (1:01)

42. Clink and Clank (0:42)

44. Hiding in Darkness (1:11)
45. Lurking (1:09)

47. A Strange Shuffle (0:22)
48. Holding Out For You (3:53)
49. Into The Autumn (piano in Gm) (0:52)
50. Letting Off Steam (0:28)
51. Screamer (1:06)

53. Call For Me (1:18)

55. Leisure Contemplation (1:55)

67. UNUSED SONG - Waiter (2:12)
68. UNUSED SONG - Record Skip Country Beat (0:41)

data.short_description: The official soundtrack for 'Feast Your Eyes: Little Marshmallow'. Also includes a few other goodies, like concept sketches and a small diary.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
  • Sound Card: You need an audible device.
  • Additional Notes: You'll find the soundtrack in the folder where the game is installed.
